data.name: PX1000Fix
data.value: Fix PXAction handler signature

data.name: PX1000Title
data.value: Invalid PXAction handler signature

data.name: PX1001Fix
data.value: Create a graph instance by using the factory method

data.name: PX1001Title
data.value: A PXGraph instance must be created with the PXGraph.CreateInstance() factory method

data.name: PX1002Fix
data.value: Add the type attribute corresponding to the list attribute

data.name: PX1002Title
data.value: The field must have the type attribute corresponding to the list attribute

data.name: PX1003Title
data.value: Consider using a specific implementation of PXGraph

data.name: PX1004Fix
data.value: Consider changing the declaration order

data.name: PX1004Title
data.value: This order of view declarations will cause creation of two cache instances: {0} and {1}

data.name: PX1005Fix
data.value: Change the view delegate name to match the view name

data.name: PX1005MessageFormat
data.value: A possible typo in the view delegate name. The view name for this delegate: {0}

data.name: PX1005Title
data.value: A possible typo in the view delegate name

data.name: PX1006Fix
data.value: Consider changing the declaration order

data.name: PX1006Title
data.value: This order of view declarations will cause creation of one cache instance for the following DACs: {0} and {1}

data.name: PX1007FixExcludeClass
data.value: Exclude the class from the API Reference

data.name: PX1007Title
data.value: A public {0} should have a description in the summary XML tag

data.name: PX1008Title
data.value: Reference of @this graph in this delegate will cause synchronous delegate execution

data.name: PX1009Fix
data.value: Change the base type to a PXCacheExtension overload

data.name: PX1009Title
data.value: Multiple levels of inheritance are not supported for PXCacheExtension

data.name: PX1010Fix
data.value: Reset StartRow

data.name: PX1010Title
data.value: If a delegate applies paging in an inner select, StartRow must be reset (If StartRow is not reset, paging will be applied twice)

data.name: PX1011Fix
data.value: Mark the type as sealed

data.name: PX1011Title
data.value: Because multiple levels of inheritance are not supported for PXCacheExtension, the derived type can be marked as sealed

data.name: PX1012Fix
data.value: Change the type parameter of the action to the primary DAC ({0})

data.name: PX1012Title
data.value: The type parameter of the {0} action is not the primary DAC. You should specify the {1} DAC as the type parameter to make the action available on the toolbar.

data.name: PX1014Fix
data.value: Make the type nullable

data.name: PX1014Title
data.value: A DAC field must have a nullable type

data.name: PX1015MessageFormatWithOnlyRequiredParams
data.value: The number of arguments passed to the {0} method does not match the number of BQL statement parameters. The number of required arguments is {1}.

data.name: PX1015MessageFormatWithRequiredAndOptionalParams
data.value: The number of arguments passed to the {0} method does not match the number of BQL statement parameters. The number of arguments should be from {1} to {2}.

data.name: PX1018Title
data.value: The graph with the specified primary DAC type does not contain a view of this type

data.name: PX1021Title
data.value: The type of the DAC field attribute does not correspond to the property type

data.name: PX1021PropertyFix
data.value: Change the property type so that it corresponds to the attribute type

data.name: PX1023MultipleTypeAttributesOnPropertyTitle
data.value: The DAC property cannot be marked with multiple field type attributes

data.name: PX1023MultipleTypeAttributesOnAggregatorsTitle
data.value: The attribute aggregates incompatible field type attributes

data.name: PX1023MultipleSpecialTypeAttributesOnPropertyTitle
data.value: The DAC property cannot be marked with multiple PXDBScalar or PXDBCalced attributes

data.name: PX1023MultipleSpecialTypeAttributesOnAggregatorsTitle
data.value: The attribute aggregates multiple PXDBScalar or PXDBCalced attributes

data.name: PX1023TypeAttributesFix
data.value: Leave the selected attribute and remove other field type attributes from the property

data.name: PX1023SpecialAttributesFix
data.value: Leave the selected attribute and remove other PXDBScalar or PXDBCalced attributes from the property

data.name: PX1024Title
data.value: The DAC field type must be abstract

data.name: PX1024Fix
data.value: Make the DAC field type abstract

data.name: PX1026Title
data.value: Underscores cannot be used in DAC declarations

data.name: PX1026Fix
data.value: Remove underscores from the DAC declaration

data.name: PX1027Fix
data.value: Remove the forbidden field from the DAC declaration

data.name: PX1027MessageFormat
data.value: The {0} field cannot be declared within a DAC declaration

data.name: PX1028Fix
data.value: Remove the constructor

data.name: PX1028Title
data.value: Constructors in DACs are prohibited

data.name: PX1029Title
data.value: PXGraph instances cannot be used inside DAC properties

data.name: PX1031Title
data.value: DACs cannot contain instance methods

data.name: PX1032Title
data.value: DAC properties cannot contain method invocations

data.name: PX1030FixBound
data.value: Set PersistingCheck of PXDefaultAttribute to Nothing

data.name: PX1030TitleDefaultAttributeOnDacExtension
data.value: The PXDefault attribute of the field is used incorrectly. PXDefaultAttribute used on a custom field defined in PXCacheExtension can potentially prevent updates to existing records when used without PersistingCheck property set to Nothing

data.name: PX1040Fix
data.value: Move the code to the Initialize() method

data.name: PX1040Title
data.value: Constructors in BLC extensions are strictly prohibited. Use the Initialize() method instead

data.name: PX1030FixUnbound
data.value: Replace with PXUnboundDefaultAttribute

data.name: PX1042Fix
data.value: Surround the BQL statement or database query execution with a connection scope

data.name: PX1042Title
data.value: In a RowSelecting handler, BQL statements and other database queries must be executed only inside a separate connection scope

data.name: PX1050Title
data.value: Hardcoded strings are not allowed as parameters for localization methods and PXException constructors. You should use string constants from the appropriate localizable messages class.

data.name: PX1051Title
data.value: Non-localizable strings are not allowed as parameters for localization methods and PXException constructors. You should mark the appropriate messages class with PXLocalizableAttribute.

data.name: PX1052Title
data.value: Incorrect format string in the localization method. You should use correct format string constants from the appropriate localizable messages class.

data.name: PX1053Title
data.value: Strings concatenation is not allowed as a parameter for localization methods and PXException constructors. You should use localization format methods instead.

data.name: PX1015Title
data.value: The number of arguments passed to the method does not match the number of BQL statement parameters

data.name: PX1027Title
data.value: System fields cannot be declared within a DAC declaration

data.name: PX1043Title
data.value: Changes cannot be saved to the database from the event handler

data.name: PX1043TitleRowPersisting
data.value: Only the methods of the PXCache.Persist family can be used to save changes to the database from a RowPersisting event handler

data.name: PX1044Title
data.value: Changing PXCache is prohibited in this event handler

data.name: PX1044MessageFormat
data.value: Changing PXCache is prohibited in the {0} event handler

data.name: PX1057Title
data.value: A PXGraph instance cannot be initialized while another PXGraph instance is being initialized

data.name: PX1046Title
data.value: A long-running operation cannot be started within an event handler

data.name: EventHandlerSignatureCodeActionTitle
data.value: Convert an event handler signature to the generic one. Please, be careful because an event handler can be overwritten somewhere else.

data.name: PX1045Title
data.value: A PXGraph instance cannot be created within an event handler

data.name: PX1058Title
data.value: A PXGraph instance should not save changes to the database during the initialization phase

data.name: PX1047MessageFormat
data.value: A DAC instance passed to the {0} event handler cannot be modified inside this event handler

data.name: PX1059Title
data.value: Changes to PXCache cannot be performed during PXGraph initialization

data.name: PX1047Title
data.value: A DAC instance passed to the event handler cannot be modified inside the event handler

data.name: PX1054Title
data.value: A PXGraph instance should not start PXLongOperation during the initialization phase

data.name: PX1048MessageFormat
data.value: Only the DAC instance that is passed in the event arguments can be modified in the {0} event handler

data.name: PX1048Title
data.value: Only the DAC instance that is passed in the event arguments can be modified in this event handler

data.name: PX1049Title
data.value: In a RowSelected handler, BQL statements and other database queries should be avoided

data.name: PX1070Title
data.value: The state of fields and actions can be configured only in the RowSelected event handler

data.name: PX1071Title
data.value: Actions cannot be executed within event handlers

data.name: PX1072Title
data.value: BQL queries must be executed within the context of an existing PXGraph instance

data.name: PX1080Title
data.value: Data view delegates should not start long-running operations

data.name: PX1055FixEditKeyFieldAttributes
data.value: Make the field bound to the identity column be the only key field in the DAC

data.name: PX1055FixEditIdentityAttribute
data.value: Make the field bound to the identity column be a non-key field and leave all other key fields untouched

data.name: PX1055FixRemoveIdentityAttribute
data.value: Remove the definition of the field bound to the identity column and leave all other key fields untouched. (You should drop the corresponding identity column from the database manually.)

data.name: PX1055Title
data.value: Invalid primary key of the DAC. Use a single identity field or one or multiple natural fields for the key.

data.name: PX1073Title
data.value: Exceptions cannot be thrown in the RowPersisted event handler

data.name: PX1074Title
data.value: PXSetupNotEnteredException cannot be thrown in this event handler. Use the RowSelected event handler instead

data.name: PX1074MessageFormat
data.value: PXSetupNotEnteredException cannot be thrown in the {0} event handler. Use the RowSelected event handler instead

data.name: PX1075MessageFormat
data.value: PXCache.RaiseExceptionHandling cannot be invoked from the {0} event handler

data.name: PX1075Title
data.value: PXCache.RaiseExceptionHandling cannot be invoked from this event handler

data.name: PX1081Title
data.value: Actions cannot be executed during the PXGraph initialization

data.name: PX1082Title
data.value: Actions cannot be executed within data view delegates

data.name: PX1072Fix
data.value: Replace {0} with the following PXGraph instance: {1}

data.name: PX1083Title
data.value: Changes cannot be saved to the database from data view delegates

data.name: PX1030TitleDefaultAttributeOnDac
data.value: Consider setting PersistingCheck to Nothing or replacing PXDefault with PXUnboundDefault

data.name: PX1084Title
data.value: PXGraph instances cannot be initialized within data view delegates

data.name: PX1085Title
data.value: BQL statements and other database queries should not be executed during the PXGraph initialization

data.name: PX1086Title
data.value: PXSetupNotEnteredException cannot be thrown in long-running operations

data.name: PX1087Title
data.value: This invocation of the base data view delegate can cause a StackOverflowException

data.name: PX1088Title
data.value: Processing delegates cannot use the data views from processing graphs except for the data views of the PXFilter, PXProcessingBase, or PXSetup types

data.name: PX1089Title
data.value: The state of fields and actions cannot be configured in action delegates

data.name: PX1090Title
data.value: PXSetupNotEnteredException cannot be thrown in action handlers

data.name: PX1091Title
data.value: This invocation of the base action handler can cause a StackOverflowException

data.name: PX1092Title
data.value: Action handlers must be decorated with the PXUIField attribute and the PXButton attribute or its successors

data.name: PX1092Fix
data.value: Add the missing attribute or attributes to the action handler

data.name: PX1093Fix
data.value: Change graph type parameter

data.name: PX1093Title
data.value: Graph declaration should contain graph type as first type paramenter

data.name: PX1060Fix
data.value: Make field strongly typed

data.name: PX1060Title
data.value: The {0} field should be strongly typed to be used in the fluent BQL queries

data.name: PX1061Fix
data.value: Make constant strongly typed

data.name: PX1061Title
data.value: The {0} constant should be strongly typed to be used in the fluent BQL queries

data.name: PX1094FixPXCacheNameAttribute
data.value: Add the PXCacheName attribute

data.name: PX1094FixPXHiddenAttribute
data.value: Add the PXHidden attribute

data.name: PX1094Title
data.value: A DAC must be decorated with the PXHidden or PXCacheName attribute

data.name: PX1094PXCacheNameDefaultArgumentValue
data.value: Enter a cache name for this DAC

data.name: PX1095Title
data.value: A field with the PXDBCalced attribute must have an unbound type attribute, such as PXDate, PXDecimal

data.name: PX1013Fix
data.value: Change the return type to IEnumerable

data.name: PX1013Title
data.value: The action handler that initiates a background operation or is executed by a background operation must return IEnumerable

data.name: PX1043TitleRowPersistedNonISV
data.value: Only the methods of the PXCache.Persist family can be used to save changes to the database from a RowPersisted event handler

data.name: PX1007FixAddDescription
data.value: Add a description

data.name: SuppressDiagnosticGroupCodeActionTitle
data.value: Suppress the {0} diagnostic with Acuminator

data.name: SuppressDiagnosticWithCommentNestedCodeActionTitle
data.value: in a comment

data.name: SuppressDiagnosticInSuppressionFileCodeActionTitle
data.value: in the Acuminator suppression file

data.name: SuppressDiagnosticWithCommentNonNestedCodeActionTitle
data.value: Suppress the {0} diagnostic with Acuminator in a comment

data.name: PX1007Class
data.value: class

data.name: PX1007Delegate
data.value: delegate

data.name: PX1007Enum
data.value: enumeration

data.name: PX1007Interface
data.value: interface

data.name: PX1007Struct
data.value: struct

data.name: PX1007DefaultEntity
data.value: entity

data.name: PX1007DacProperty
data.value: DAC property

data.name: PX1019Title
data.value: A DAC property field with the AutoNumber attribute must have the string type

data.name: PX1020Title
data.value: For a DAC property field with the AutoNumber attribute, the string length must be greater than {0}

data.name: PX1019Fix
data.value: Change the type to string

data.name: PX1020Fix
data.value: Make the string length sufficient for the auto-numbering

data.name: PX1022DacFix
data.value: Make the DAC extension public

data.name: PX1022DacTitle
data.value: Non-public DAC extensions are not supported

data.name: PX1022GraphFix
data.value: Make the graph extension public

data.name: PX1022GraphTitle
data.value: Non-public graph extensions are not supported

data.name: PX1016DacExtensionTitle
data.value: A DAC extension must include the public static IsActive method with the bool return type. Extensions which are constantly active reduce performance. Suppress the error if you need the DAC extension to be constantly active.

data.name: PX1016GraphExtensionTitle
data.value: A graph extension must include a public static IsActive method with the bool return type. Extensions which are constantly active reduce performance. Suppress the error if you need the graph extension to be constantly active.

data.name: PX1033Title
data.value: The DAC does not have an explicit primary key declaration

data.name: PX1034Title
data.value: The DAC does not have an explicit foreign key declaration

data.name: PX1035Title
data.value: The DAC has multiple key declarations which use the same set of fields

data.name: PX1036PKTitle
data.value: The DAC must have one primary key which should be named "PK". This key could be turned into a primary key for this DAC.

data.name: PX1036FKTitle
data.value: The class containing DAC foreign keys should be named "FK"

data.name: PX1033Fix
data.value: Add a primary key declaration to the DAC

data.name: PX1036PK_ChangeNameFix
data.value: Change the name of this key to "PK"

data.name: PX1035Fix
data.value: Remove other key declarations that use the same fields from the DAC

data.name: PX1034Fix
data.value: Add a foreign key declaration template to the DAC

data.name: PX1034FixTemplateLine1
data.value: Add all foreign keys for the DAC here. For referenced DACs with a PK class, you can use the following template:

data.name: PX1034FixTemplateLine2
data.value: public class ReferencedDacFK : ReferencedDAC.PK.ForeignKeyOf<{0}>.By<joinField1, joinFields, ...> {{ }}

data.name: PX1034FixTemplateLine3
data.value: For referenced DACs without a PK class and with a single primary key field, you can use the following template:

data.name: PX1034FixTemplateLine4
data.value: public class ReferencedDacFK : Field<joinField>.IsRelatedTo<ReferencedDAC.keyField>.AsSimpleKey.WithTablesOf<ReferencedDAC, {0}> {{ }}

data.name: PX1034FixTemplateLine5
data.value: For referenced DACs without a PK class and with a composite primary key, you can use the following template:

data.name: PX1034FixTemplateLine6
data.value: public class ReferencedDacFK : CompositeKey< Field<joinField1>.IsRelatedTo<ReferencedDAC.keyField1>, Field<joinField2>.IsRelatedTo<ReferencedDAC.keyField2>, ... >.WithTablesOf<SOOrder, SOOrder> {{ }}

data.name: PX1034FixTemplateLine7
data.value: You can start with the following properties:

data.name: PX1036SingleUKTitle
data.value: The single unique key in the DAC should be named "UK"

data.name: PX1036SingleUKFix
data.value: Change the name of the single unique key to "UK"

data.name: PX1036MultipleUKTitle
data.value: All unique keys in the DAC should be declared in a public static class named "UK"

data.name: PX1036MultipleUKFix
data.value: Place all unique keys in a public static class named "UK"

data.name: PX1036PK_ChangeNameAndLocationFix
data.value: Change this key into the DAC's primary key "PK"

data.name: PX1037Title
data.value: Unbound DAC fields can not be used in declarations of primary, foreign or unique keys

data.name: PX1037MessageFormat
data.value: Unbound DAC fields such as {0} can not be used in {1} key declaration

data.name: KeyTypeForeign
data.value: foreign

data.name: KeyTypePrimary
data.value: primary

data.name: KeyTypeUnique
data.value: unique
